title: Getting ready for the beta launch
intro: In anticipation of announcing Zood to more of the world, we've launched our new website.

title: Zood Location available for Android
intro: Today we're publicly releasing Zood Location for Android. This has been the culmination of several years of (part-time) work in the hopes of releasing something easy enough for family members to use, while remaining secure.

title: Why does Zood Location for Android use the Google Maps SDK?
intro: This is a question that has been asked often. I wrote up a comprehensive answer on a social networking site awhile ago, but I figure it should also be here.
